value.title: An Interview with Netflix co-CEO Greg Peters About Engagement and Warner Bros.
value.content: An interview with Netflix co-CEO Greg Peters about engagement, competition, and the Warner Bros. acquisition.

value.title: TSMC Earnings, The TSMC Brake Revisited, Why AI Needs Foundry Competition
value.content: TSMC admitted that it has invested too little in the face of overwhelming demand for AI; that's why the industry needs to facilitate competition for the foundry leader.

value.title: Ads in ChatGPT, Why OpenAI Needs Ads, The Long Road to Instagram
value.content: OpenAI finally announced that ads are coming to ChatGPT. It's an important step, but one with far more risk given the delay — and the delay means the ads aren't yet the right ones.

value.title: 2026.03: Technology Doings
value.content: The best Stratechery content from the week of January 12, 2026, including what technology did for United, what it is doing to legacy media, and what it should do for Apple.
